Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: In Connecticut’s win over St. John’s on Jan. 8, ESPN analyst Bucky Waters, while extolling Jerome Dyson’s nine steals, went too far with analogies of crime.
snippet: In Connecticut’s win over St. John’s on Jan. 8, ESPN analyst Bucky Waters, while extolling Jerome Dyson’s nine steals, went too far with analogies of crime.
